sftpServerAddress.description: Specify the SFTP Server name or IP address
sftpServerAddress.tooltip: Specify the SFTP Server name or IP address

sftpServerPort.description: Specify the port on which the SFTP Server is listening
sftpServerPort.tooltip: Specify the SFTP Server port number

acceptAnySSHServerHostKey.description: Specify true to use SSH Server HostKey to connect to the SFTP Server
acceptAnySSHServerHostKey.tooltip: Specify true to use SSH Server HostKey to connect to the SFTP Server

sSHServerHostKey.description: Specify the SSH Server HostKey to connect to the SFTP Server
sSHServerHostKey.tooltip: Specify the SSH Server HostKey to connect to the SFTP Server

rootFolderPath.description: Specify a root folder path. File paths would be relative to this folder
